description: If you're a huge Houston fan, this is the app for you! Houston Baseball Fans provides you with access to the latest news, videos, stats, standings and scores. You'll always know what's happening with the team!  Plus you’ll find detailed team, roster and schedule information, so you’ll always be the most knowledgeable fan in the room.   You can also discuss the latest news and highlights with other Houston fans using the built in chat feature. Make sure your voice is heard!   There is no better or more comprehensive tool to stay up to date with Houston. If you are a true fan, you owe it to yourself to download Houston Baseball Fans today!   ** Arctic Gerbil Creations, Brighthouse Labs, and the Houston Baseball Fans application are in no way associated with MLB or the Houston Astros baseball team. All trademarks are owned by their respective owners.
